channel.title: Prerequisites on TIBCO Cloud Integration - Flogo SDK
channel.description: Recent content in Prerequisites on TIBCO Cloud Integration - Flogo SDK

item.title: Use Project Flogo activities
item.description: Leveraging the already existing activities built by the Project Flogo community is really easy! Simply zip them up and upload them to TIBCO Cloud™ Integration. Let’s say that you want to use the Counter activity from the flogo-contrib repository on GitHub. We’ll walk you through the steps to use that activity First you’ll need to download or clone the repository git clone https://github.com/TIBCOSoftware/flogo-contrib Now, create a zip file of the counter activity in the activity folder

item.title: Create new activities
item.description: Creating new activities for the Flogo in TIBCO Cloud™ Integration isn’t hard. Depending on your requirements a new activity requires a bit of Go and possibly a bit of TypeScript. The TIBCO Cloud™ Integration - Flogo® is powered by Project Flogo, so when you’re developing extensions for TIBCO Cloud™ Integration - Flogo® the runtime parts are the same as you would create them for Flogo. That also means that extensions for Flogo will work in TIBCO Cloud™ Integration - Flogo® and vice versa!
